meanings.sent1: During the parade, the musician played a lively tune on the tabret.
meanings.sent2: She shook the tabret to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent3: The tabret seemed to dance in the hands of the skilled drummer.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the tabret echoed through the room, filling it with energy.
meanings.sent5: Children gathered around to watch the colorful tabret being played.

meanings.sent1: He would tabret with passion at every celebration.
meanings.sent2: They tabreted together, creating a joyful rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to tabret with its tail on the floor, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tabreted through the room, bringing smiles to all.
meanings.sent5: The music teacher showed the students how to tabret with skill and precision.
